name: Belly Bumper
description:
Get addicted to the ENDLESS BUMPING FUN! Help wannabe hero OPU on his journey to look for Tummatopia and end the bumping war forever!

-BUMP your way through 80 exciting stages
-INVITE all 16 tribesmen with distinct characteristics
-UNLEASH the power of all 16 powerful skills
-EVOLVE all 22 models of Belly Belts
-CAPTURE opponents for extra rewards
-COLLECT all the tatts to upgrade your tribesmen
-DOMINATE the leaderboard in the endless mode

DOES NOT SUPPORT iPhone4, iPad 1 and iPod Touch 4
